channel.title: Comments on: Using CFWindow within a form
channel.description: Web development notes and commentary from Ryan Stille

item.title: By: praveen
item.dc:creator: praveen
item.description: hi i am trying to use CFwindow function in OBD, but its not supported.. is there any alternative tag
item.content:encoded:
hi i am trying to use CFwindow function in OBD, but its not supported..
is there any alternative tag

item.title: By: lakshmi
item.dc:creator: lakshmi
item.content:encoded:
function doSubmit() {
var hiddenAge = document.getElementById(“hidden_age”);
var age = document.getElementById(“age”);
hiddenAge.value = age.value;
document.getElementById(“theForm”).submit();
}

The above code still carries the age value as null.
